mapper.insert: INSERT INTO algorithm_records (user_id, problem_number, title, code, language, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{problemNumber}, #{title}, #{code}, #{language}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, problem_number, title, code, language, created_at, updated_at FROM algorithm_records ORDER BY id DESC
